Title: Relates to Medicaid reimbursement rates for inpatient psychiatric care
Summary: Requires Medicaid reimbursement rates for inpatient psychiatric care to remain consistent and uniform throughout the duration of the patient's hospitalization, regardless of length of stay.
LawCode: Amd ยง2807-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to Medicaid reimbursement rates for inpatient psychiatric care
